alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 11:07PM EDT until April 20 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Shoal River Near Crestview affecting Okaloosa County. For the Shoal River...including Crestview...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shoal River Near Crestview. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet late Tuesday night. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
